ygData.msgSnippet: Now I get it the goal If I remember Right I was the only one who had the gut to stand up to you and your right it hasn t changed but unlike you I learned

Now I get it the goal If I remember Right I was the only one who had the gut 
to stand up to you and your right it hasn't changed but unlike you I learned 
somethings.Yeah I lost the Fights to you but Winner of one Fight not 
important as long as one has the strength to pick up and carry on to complete 
his goals that's all that matters in the end. In truth you are coward that 
gets off all killing women and weak oppenets and you dare lecture me. That's 
why when I was a newbie you always put me through the streets but what got 
you is I got up and said "Is that all you got?"  And on the Leadership do you 
really think I care so much about leader is just a title a true leader is 
created by his actions not his name. Also that phrase the Its end of the Road 
scares you because you know that there is someone out there is going to stop 
and it may not be me because fate has a way of punishing evil.  But even if 
do lose to you a million times there is always a million and 1 so I'm never 
going to give up.  I owe that to the newbies you butchered in chat rooms and 
to one close friend you killed so in truth you don't win until I give 
up.JP3884 if you want to beg to stay dream on. 
But discard fusion cannon even though I have it Yanshosh says I can't use it.
